verbs.description: [V: surveying] [ARG1: hurricane damage] trump struggles with his latest empathy test donald trump traveled to north carolina yesterday visiting an area hard hit by hurricane florence unfortunately he apparently became preoccupied with a boat donald trump trump tropical cyclone
